bibl.title: Euripides, Alexandros fr. 46 Snell Unmasked as Ilias T 325-329.
bibl.note: Bruno Snell, Euripides' Alexandros und andere Strassburger Papyri mit Fragmenten griechischer Dichter (Berlin, 1937) fr. 46 = P. Stras. Inv. 2344 (= Pack2 432), 1-5. The fragment is not Euripidean, but contains lines 325-9 of Iliad book T. Third century B.C.
bibl.seg: Huys Marc, Euripides, Alexandros fr. 46 Snell Unmasked as Ilias T 325-329.
ZPE 79 (1989) pp. 261-265 et pl. VII a.
